content:
I don't have personal opinions or preferences, but i can tell you about some of the most memorable moments of before the game!

before the game was known for its light-hearted humor, witty banter, and entertaining segments. some of the most memorable moments of the show include:

- the "street talk" segment, in which the hosts interviewed fans outside afl games, asking them offbeat questions about the sport and their favorite players.

- the "bounce" segment, where guests would make humorous predictions about upcoming afl games using a bouncing ball.

- the "my favorite waste of time" segment, where the hosts would talk about their favorite non-sports-related hobbies or interests.

- the "hangin' in there, baby!" segment, which featured a live animal (usually a reptile or insect) in the studio, and challenged guests to hold or interact with it.

it's hard to pick a favorite episode or moment from before the game, as there were so many hilarious and entertaining segments over the years. however, what made the show special is the natural chemistry and humor between the hosts and guests, which made it a must-watch for sports fans and comedy lovers alike.
